author: Madeleine Carlisle
title: Gov. Cuomo Says Chinese Government Donated 1,000 Ventilators to New York
description: He also announced that the state of Oregon contacted New York, unsolicited, and said it will send 140 ventilators to help address the crisis.
content: During a press conference on Saturday, New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced that the Chinese government is facilitating a donation of 1,000 ventilators to New York, which has been struck hard by the COVID-19 pandemic. Cuomo said the ventilators will arrive at… [+2422 chars]
